lines.text: One startled look and I knew, I was right back where I'd started.
The time is now and now is all we have.
My role in all this was to make her feel better. Better than what?
You must resign yourself to being extraordinary.
Where else was I gonna go? Got all I need right here.
You should have seen all you brought down. Sirens, ambulances, doctors, nurses, butchers, bakers. Some big fear you brought down Miss Joan.
Give me your shoe! I want to kiss the ground you walk on!
Sometimes a little distraction's ... a good thing.
